title: What on earth do the lyrics to the They Might Be Giants hit 'Birdhouse In Your Soul,' actually mean - anyone? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's a song about a nightlight shaped like a bird, plugged into an outlet by the light switch. It's always there to help you navigate the room which has a picture of a lighthouse on the opposing wall. The deeper meaning is that we should be grateful for those people and things which help us in our daily lives, no matter how small. Build a birdhouse in your soul.
